items.title: As consumers ditch Google for ChatGPT, Peec AI raises $21M to help brands adapt
items.summary: With consumers increasingly asking questions to ChatGPT, not Google, product discovery is changing — and the promise to give brands visibility and control over this fast-growing search channel has made Peec AI one of Europe's hottest startups.

The exclusive deal here gives you a total $50 markdown off the going rate, landing it at the third-best price we have tracked – just $2 above that one-time low. Head below to check out the full lineup of exclusive massagers, face masks, and more.
